source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_00<tab>Kazagg Chah wishes to guide you further along the path of the black mage.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_00<tab>バーガンディ滝のカザグ・チャーは冒険者にしてほしいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_01<tab>Da Za tells you that he set out from his kobold homeland of O'Ghomoro to pursue the same legend recounted by Kazagg Chah and Dozol Meloc. He holds a stone tablet passed down to him from his ancestor Da Gu. Upon showing it to you, the light from your Gem of Shatotto reveals writing carved into its surface indicating that closing the voidgate requires certain <var 1A 02 /var>garb<var 1A 01 /var>. To locate three of the pieces, pour the blood of Kazagg Chah into the planar fissure at the Zanr'ak encampment in southern Thanalan, the blood of Dozol Meloc into the planar fissure at the Ixali logging grounds in the North Shroud, and the blood of Da Za into the planar fissure at O'Ghomoro in outer La Noscea.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_01<tab>カザグ・チャーから依頼を受けた。次の作業を行い、「黒魔道士の装束」を集めよう。南ザナラーンのザンラク脇本陣にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E0201 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87AC01 /var>」を。北部森林のイクサル軍伐採所にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E0301 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883B01 /var>」を。外地ラノシアのウ･ガマロ武装鉱山にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E0401 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883C01 /var>」を刻もう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_02<tab>Your blood-pouring activities have netted you three pieces of wizard's garb. Return to Burgundy Falls and show Kazagg Chah your new duds.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_02<tab>指定の作業を終えた。東ザナラーンのバーガンディ滝にいる「カザグ・チャー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_03<tab>During your absence, Kazagg Chah and his companions have tracked down the location of the fourth garment mentioned in the tablet. Travel to Thal's Respite in eastern Thanalan, investigate the planar fissure that has opened there, and procure the blood of any fiends that emerge from it.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_03<tab>カザグ・チャーと話した。東ザナラーンのザルの祠にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E0501 /var>」を調べ現れた妖異を討伐し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883D01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_04<tab>You have obtained the voidsent's blood. Pour it into the planar fissure that yet remains.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883D01 /var>を入手した。東ザナラーンのザルの祠にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E0501 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883D01 /var>」を刻み、「黒魔道士の装束」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_05<tab>You have obtained the fourth piece of wizard's garb. Take word of your accomplishment to Kazagg Chah at Burgundy Falls in eastern Thanalan.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_05<tab>「黒魔道士の装束」を入手した。東ザナラーンのバーガンディ滝にいる「カザグ・チャー」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_06You learn from Kazagg Chah that a fifth piece of wizard's garb yet remains, and that its location is a mystery. The only clue the ancient tablet gives is that the body armor rests in the Solace of the Gods. The Amalj'aa black mage tells you he will continue researching the matter. In the meantime, carry on with your studies, and make preparations to seal the voidgate once and for all.

※The next black mage quest will be available from Kazagg Chah upon reaching level 50.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_SEQ_06カザグ･チャーに報告した。彼らは残された予言の文言である「至聖所」について、調査を進めておくと語った。

※黒魔道士のレベルが50以上になると、カザグ・チャーから次の黒魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_00<tab>Pour Kazagg Chah's blood into the planar fissure at the Zanr'ak encampment.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_00<tab>ザンラク脇本陣の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E0201 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87AC01 /var>を刻み黒魔道士の装束を入手

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_01<tab>Pour Dozol Meloc's blood into the planar fissure at the Ixali logging grounds.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_01<tab>イクサル軍伐採所の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E0301 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883B01 /var>を刻み黒魔道士の装束を入手

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_02<tab>Pour Da Za's blood into the planar fissure at O'Ghomoro.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_02<tab>ウ･ガマロ武装鉱山の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E0401 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883C01 /var>を刻み黒魔道士の装束を入手

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Kazagg Chah at Burgundy Falls.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_03<tab>バーガンディ滝のカザグ・チャーと話す

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_04<tab>Investigate the planar fissure at Thal's Respite and obtain the blood of any fiends that emerge.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_04<tab>ザルの祠の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E0501 /var>を調べ妖異を討伐し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883D01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_05<tab>Pour the fiend's blood into the planar fissure and obtain the black mage relic armor.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_05<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8E0501 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883D01 /var>を刻み黒魔道士の装束を入手

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Kazagg Chah at Burgundy Falls.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_TODO_06<tab>バーガンディ滝のカザグ・チャーに報告

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> of the black, our brother Da Za has words for you. Pray wait a moment for him to arrive.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_000熱烈歓迎。よく来た、黒魔道士)) (( )) 02 /var>。
「メンディカント269　ダ・ザ」が汝を呼んでいる。
話を聞きにいくがいい。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_001<tab>You have reclaimed the key from the depths of the Shroud─wood, forest, Shroud. Yes, you have done well. Very, very well. You are truly the black mage foretold by legend─oracle, prophecy, legend.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_001黒衣森　石塔かーら　あたらしーいカギ　できーたね！
すごーい　すごーいや！
やーっぱり　きみー　「伝説」の……！！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_002<tab>It was such a legend of my people that brought me to this Thanalan. Such is what legends do.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_002ぼくーの　ご先祖　ダ・グかーら　伝わる「伝説」とーり。
……ぼくー　ザナラーンに　きーた。

source:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_003“When four magi meet in a barren land,
Black powers of eld woven by their hand,
Shall see the fate of wickedness made stark,
And the path to light shall be lit by dark.” Black, shadow, dark.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_003魔の道を知るー　4名の者　荒れ野にーて　出会いーし時
古のー　破壊の力によってー　邪なるもーのを
封じー　正しーき道をー　切り開かーん……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_004<tab>You have heard these words before. Yes, yes, here I found Kazagg Chah and Dozol Meloc. The words that brought us to Thanalan are the same─equal, identical, same.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_004そー　すーっかり　同じー　言葉。
ふたりと　同じー　言葉　伝わーって　導かーれて
ここに　ぼくー　きーた。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_005<tab>It was one hundred years ago that a kobold first deciphered the legend─decrypted, decoded, deciphered. The great mage who did it was my own ancestor, 1st Order Patriarch Da Gu. Yes, yes, my very own.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_005今かーら　100年前　コボルド族　筆頭術士「ダ・グ」
古のー　術書　読み解いーた。
ダ・グ　ぼくーの　ご先祖　とーっても　えらーい。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_006<tab>But he broke kobold law. The first patriarch must never leave O'Ghomoro. No, no, never. But leave he did. He set out from La Noscea to pursue this legend. And for that he was named traitor─betrayer, turncloak, traitor.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_006ダ・グ　「筆頭術士　オ・ゴモロ　離れ　いーけない」
掟を　破ってー　故郷ラノシア出てー　伝説　追ったー。
ダ・グ　掟破ったー　「裏切り者」……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_007<tab>None were drawn to the words of Da Gu. No, no, not a single kobold soul. They ignored his words. But when first I heard them, I felt strange─peculiar, odd, strange.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_007ダ・グ　そそのかしーた「伝説」をー
ふーかく　知ろーとすーる者　いーなかった。
でーも　ぼくーは　こーの伝説　気になっーた。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_008<tab>I felt I must do something. I could not simply be idle. I, too, left La Noscea, just as Da Gu before me. Yes, and I have come here to Thanalan.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_008なにーか　しーなきゃ　いけない　気がしーて……！
ラノシア　飛び出しー　ザナラーンに　きーた！
まるーで　ダ・グ　同じよーに……！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_009<tab>Now I see the legend is real. Yes, the words kept by Kazagg Chah, Dozol Meloc, and myself are true. <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> have appeared. That is no coincidence. No, no, none at all.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_009ぼくー　かれーら　伝わーる　言葉　どーり
きみー現れー　ぼくー　こーれ　運命　思ったー。
でーも　ぼくー　ふたりみーたいに　知識　なーい。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_010<tab>I am a kobold. Yes, yes, I am, and we kobolds are good at finding things─treasures, trinkets, things. I will help you where I can.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_010でーもでも　コボルド族　誇り
おたかーら　見つけ出すー　勘　あーる！
きみー　手助けー　させーて　ほしーい！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_011<tab>Da Gu left behind many things when he left. Yes, many, many things. I was given a stone tablet. The others in my family thought it rubbish─dross, refuse, rubbish. Its surface has many scratches, you see. Yes, many, many. But I sense in it a great power.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_011ダ・グ　100年前　ラノシア　去る時
たくーさん　「ガラクタ」　残しーた。
でーも　ホントーは　ガラクータじゃないー　見てー！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_012<tab>Here, it may give some─ Your gem! The light! It is illuminating the tablet. The scratches are...growing!? Mighty Titan, those are no scratches! No, no, not scratches at all. They are carvings! Words!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_012ダ・グ　残しーた　こーの石版。
……きみー　「シャトトの魔石」　輝き　受けーて
文字　浮きーだし　きーたんだ！

source:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_013“Know thee, brave keeper of Shatotto's light,
As these very words wax plain to thy sight,
The seal what was cast doth shudder and sigh,
And the voidgate's dread sundering draws nigh.”
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_013……魔石のー　輝き　にーて
我が　言葉を　解くー　者あーり……すなわーち
ヴォイドゲートの　封印がー　放たれーる時　近し……。

source:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_014“To ward against the creeping of the Gloom,
Thou needest great garb to stay any doom,
To this sacred wear thy thoughts must now tend,
Unto thy black command darkness shall bend.”
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_014妖霧　退けーる　「装束」の所在　ここーに　示さーん。
力導く者　まとーいて　邪なるもーのを　封じー
正しーき道をー　切り開かーん……！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_015<tab>This tablet was more important than I ever imagined. Yes, yes, much more. It seems to say one who would close the voidgate must first find this sacred garb─gear, armor, garb!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_015……あーの「ヴォイドゲート」　閉ーざす　ため
妖霧　退けーる　とくべーつ　「装束」　必要　みーたい。
こーの石版　そーのありーか　記されーてーる　よーだね。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_016<tab>And the names of places are written here as well. Yes, yes, these four places I know. You would do well to set out and gather the first three relics.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_0164つ　ぼくー　わかーる　場所　書いーて　ある。
まーずは　さいしょー　3つ　あつめてきてー？
でーもー　なんだーか　条件　あるみーたいー！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_017<tab>Legend speaks of this. It holds that an offering of blood must be given to the planar fissures─the blood of those who have lived life steeped in the black. Only then can the relics be won. Here, take with you an offering of my blood, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_017話によらば、黒魔法と縁深い術士である吾輩たちの血を、
「」に刻むのだという……。
吾輩の血、汝に託す……遠慮無用、持っていけ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DOZOLMELOC_000_018<tab>Need Dozol's blood too, you do. Take. Take quick! Squaaawk! Before change mind.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DOZOLMELOC_000_018オレサマの血もッォ、いるみてぇだよなッァ！
装束とやらッァ、手に入れるためにッィ！
ほら、持ってけッェ、遠慮すんじゃねえッェ！！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_019<tab>And here is mine─my, me, mine. I would entrust it to no other.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_019最後ー　ぼーくの　血も　あーげるー
きーみの　こーとー　信じてーる　かーらー
がんばってーねー？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_020<tab>But be warned─one does not simply walk into these places. There are great dangers waiting. Do be careful. Yes, yes, very, very careful.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_020でーもー　無理するー　だーめーだよー
いくとーこ　全部　こわーい　場所だーからー
くれぐれーも　いのち　だいじに　よー？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_030<tab>I had no doubt you would return triumphant. Yes, yes, no doubt at all.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DAZA_000_030さーすがー　)) (( )) 02 /var>ー
ぼーくー　取ってくーると　信じてたーよー？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DOZOLMELOC_000_031<tab>Braved the logging grounds, you did. Great, great strength, you have. Squaaawk!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_DOZOLMELOC_000_031あの伐採地ッィ、まっさか突破しやがるとはなッァ！
大したモンだぜッェ、黒魔道士サマよッォ！？
オレサマがッァ、見込んだだけのことはあるぜッェ！！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_040<tab>I have awaited your return, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have learned where it is that the fourth relic of our forebears rests─the land known as Thal's Respite.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_040延頸鶴望……汝の帰りを待っていた。
4つ目の装束の場所、判明している……。
場所は東ザナラーンの「ザルの祠」だ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_051<tab>There, too, lies a planar fissure into which the blood of the fiends it births must be poured.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_051一意専心。汝は「」より現れる妖異どもと戦い、
流した己の血を、大地に刻まねばならぬ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_060<tab>The first four relics are now in your keeping. Yet the final piece remains, and our efforts to learn where it rests have been to no avail.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_060エオルゼアに散る4つの装束を集めたか。
……されど最後の装束の行方、未だ判明せず。
刑故無小。吾輩たちの努力不足、慙愧に堪えぬ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_061<tab>The dark which empowers at times obscures─such is its nature. Da Za claims his tablet names the <var 1A 02 /var>Solace of the Gods<var 1A 01 /var> as the location we seek, but none among us have ever heard tell of such a name.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_061暗中模索……汝不在の折、ダ・ザが石版より読み取り、
最後の装束隠されしは、「至聖所」なる地とまではわかった。
我ら、その名に皆目見当がつかぬ……五里霧中。

source:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_062“When a power worthy to relics claim,
Takes root in one of righteous end and name,
The Solace of the Gods will be made known,
And the last seed of the black mage be sown.”
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_062されど不撓不屈、ダ・ザはこうも石版より読み取れり。
装束に相応しき力、身につけし時、
「聖なるほこら」への道はおのずと開かれる……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_063<tab>Da Za insists his reading is correct, and both Dozol Meloc and I trust in his ability. We will endeavor to decode these words, that you might see your quest to its end. The day of the void's opening shall come. Until then, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I ask only that you continue to walk the path of the black.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_KAZAGGCHAH_000_063石版の言葉を信じ、我ら最善を尽くす。
汝、それまで鋭気を養い、黒魔道士として精進せよ。
「ヴォイドゲート」が開く日は、ほど近いゆえに。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_POP_MESSAGE<tab>Fiends emerge from the planar fissure!
target: TEXT_JOBBLM451_01077_POP_MESSAGE<tab>敵の気配を感じた！！
